author: bridge-bot
content:
<yperbasis> re: **@KamilChNethermind**
> Need to verify once more some data but this is roughly how repricing affect performance of current modexp scenarios - quite significant difference :)

This is only for nethermind - if any other client wants to do that need to make a "dummy enable" of repricing EIP for Dencun hardfork and provide branch so we can try it out
Do you want the expmod repricing to be enabled from Dencun or from Pectra? Which does the perfnet use?

author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> re: **@yperbasis**
> Do you want the expmod repricing to be enabled from Dencun or from Pectra? Which does the perfnet use?
Perfnet is on pectra.
opCodes is a Dencun spec As is a bit old and we are working to adjust it - so for benchmarks on Dencun

author: bridge-bot
content: <yperbasis> OK, I've enabled EIP-7823 & EIP-7883 for Dencun & Pectra in branch `performance-modexp` of Erigon. cc <@976542403269910539> @mlnfltv
